articles.title: Canadian women to face Argentina and Morocco in October soccer friendlies in Spain
articles.description: The Canadian women's soccer team will play Argentina and Morocco in international friendlies in Spain during the October FIFA international window. The seventh-ranked Canadians will face No. 31 Argentina on Oct. 6 and No. 76 Morocco on Oct.
